headline: CON EDISON DECLARES COMMON STOCK DIVIDEND
summary: Consolidated Edison, Inc. (Con Edison) (NYSE: ED) declared a quarterly dividend of 85 cents a share on its common stock, payable September 15, 2025 to stockholders of record as of August 13, 2025.
